odeSolver

Class OdeSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • odeSolver.OdeSolver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EulerEsplicit

    public abstract class OdeSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    General Structure For Ode Solver: Solve First Order Differential Equations: y(t)' = f(y(t, y(t)) y(0) = y0
    Author:
    sapo93

    • Constructor Detail

      • OdeSolver

        public OdeSolver(MathExpr.MathExpr exact,
         MathExpr.MathExpr func,
         double t0,
         double y0,
         double step,
         double tmax,
         MathToken.MathTokenSymbol t,
         MathToken.MathTokenSymbol y)
          throws WrongInputException,
                 WrongCalculationException
        Abstract Constructor: General Case (With Exact Solution)
        Parameters:
        exact - Exact Solution
        func - f(t, y(t))
        t0 - Initial Time
        y0 - Initial Value y(t0) = y0
        step - difference between each moment
        tmax - max time, end of calculation
        t - Independent Symbol t
        y - Dependent Symbol y(t)
        Throws:
        WrongInputException - Null Input
        WrongCalculationException
